Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Commandant, other transport crafts were intercepted by air defense. According to their crash trajectory, they should've landed near us.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After defeating the enemy, Rosetta proposed to join the others from Babylonia.'}
{3: 'Rosetta walks... or rather, floats beside you as she speaks.'}
{3: 'Noticing your gaze, Rosetta turns her head and looks over with a puzzled expression.'}
{2: 'What happened to your centaur module?', 3: '9', 4: 'Your light wings look nice.', 5: '3000'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The centaur module... You Babylonia people sure like asking about that... Quite the opposite for the ARU.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I don't know the details, but that Asimov guy said Babylonia can't help with centaur modules.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Instead, they gave me this specially upgraded spear and shield. Just as effective though.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta seems to be blushing for some reason.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "...Well, it might take a while before we can locate the crashed aircrafts. I'll tell you what happened here in the meantime.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'As you know, the virus can\'t spread as well in the environment of the Arctic. People need only repel the occasional Corrupted and the "tide" to survive.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "That's what the fishermen call them. They rise like the tide, posing danger intermittently.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "We don't know why, but bionics appear around various areas throughout the ARU at this time to wreak havoc.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Sometimes they pose a serious threat, other times less so. Regardless, they never appear in the same spot twice once they've been quelled.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'So when they requested reinforcements from Babylonia, I thought it was just business as usual. But after reading the report...', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I realized that this was different. The scale of this tide is unprecedented, as if they were trying to drown the ARU. The bionics attacked at a rate far beyond our imagination.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Could someone be controlling them from behind?', 3: '21', 4: 'Where are the bionics coming from?', 5: '22'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "From behind? No... that's impossible. The bionics have been at these brainless operations for quite some time now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "They're abandoned models from the ARU. But theoretically speaking, there shouldn't be so many after all this time.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Atiel, looks like someone's over there...", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Oh... It's the boss. We finally found the boss!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'While you were lost in thought, a man and a woman appear nearby, followed by a 6 seater snowmobile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'From your ID code... You must be Commandant Simon and Construct Atiel. Correct?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Yep! We came from a base on Earth to support the ARU.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "My name is Atiel. Our original team is still recovering from their injuries, so it's just us. We sure are happy to see you, Boss!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "Oh, you haven't heard? 【kuroname】 was the top graduate of their year in commandant school. That's why Simon and his peers call 【kuroname】 boss.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: 'Let me introduce myself, would you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "The name's Simon, Commandant Simon. I was sent here to lead troops just like you, Boss... Sorry, I'm a little motion sick.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'During his self-introduction, Simon held his head down as if in discomfort, while Atiel was like an overexcited bunny regarding you curiously.'}
{2: 'That was some time ago.', 3: '37', 4: 'At your service.', 5: '38'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'No need to be so humble, Boss. You and your team sure made your mark on the field.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Yep yep! At your service too, Boss!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I see... So, when Nikola mentioned the ground troops that arrived first, he was referring to you.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "Got that right. We've been here for almost a week.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I see... Oh right. We were just looking for the other members that crash-landed.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "Oh, then you have nothing to worry about, Rosetta. Didn't you catch what I just said?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'You found them already?', 3: '44', 4: 'Are they alright?', 5: '45'}

{2: 'Atiel', 3: "Real sharp, Boss. We've found the others already. Simon and I came here to rescue survivors after we saw the transport craft being shot down. You're the last search and rescue target.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: 'Yep! Just some minor bumps and bruises.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "Atiel, let's hurry on back now that we've found them. It's not safe with just the four of us here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "You're right. Boss, Rosetta, come with me. I'll take you to the ARU's commanding captain.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Sure feels like Atiel is the commandant out of the two...', 4: '3'}
